tooltip.tutorialmod.firestone: Hold §eSHIFT§r or §eSHIFT + ALT§r for more information!
tooltip.tutorialmod.firestone_shift: Might set you on fire. But also might protect from it!
tooltip.tutorialmod.firestone_shift_alt:
If used on §5Obsidian§r: you light on fire, or you gain fire resistance.
If used on §8anything else§r: you light on fire, or the ground lights on fire.
